mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),b.EmpId) AS EmpId, b.EmpNo, b.EmpName, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),a.DeptId) + '-' + a.DeptNo AS pId, b.EmpStatus3, b.EmpStatus4, 2 AS Lev FROM Tbb_Dept a LEFT JOIN Tbb_Employee b ON a.DeptId = b.DeptId WHERE b.EmpStatus1 != -1 AND b.EmpId != 1 UNION SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),Tbb_Dept.DeptId) + '-' + Tbb_Dept.DeptNo AS Id, Tbb_Dept.DeptNo, Tbb_Dept.DeptName, '0' AS pId, -999 AS Status3, -999 AS Status4, 1 AS Lev FROM Tbb_Dept ) AS tbl ORDER BY tbl.Lev,tbl.EmpId,tbl.EmpNo
mapper.update:
update Tbb_Employee
EmpStatus3=#{EmpStatus3},
EmpStatus4=#{EmpStatus4},
UpdateTime = getdate()
where EmpId=#{EmpId} and DeptId=#{DeptId}
